ComicInfo.Summary:
The Mercs for Money make their grand debut (in this particular comic series).
If you thought Spidey enjoyed the company of ONE Deadpool, wait'll you see how he handles a BUNCH of them.

ComicInfo.Title: Isn't It Bromantic? Part Three
